sg.com.spgroup.friendsmgmt.dm

Interface FriendConnectionRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AbstractIdentifiableRepository<FriendConnection>, org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<FriendConnection,java.util.UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<FriendConnection,java.util.UUID>

    public interface FriendConnectionRepository
extends AbstractIdentifiableRepository<FriendConnection>
    Handles all queries with regards to friend connection
